channel.title: Consultancy Services on Institute of Smart City & Management
channel.description: Recent content in Consultancy Services on Institute of Smart City & Management

item.title: Asset Management
item.description: We develop deterioration models based on reliability theory and monitoring data. Determination of optimal intervention strategies for stock of assets.

item.title: Spatial Analysis
item.description: Spatial analysis and visualization using GIS platforms and statistical models and tools for urban planning and management.

item.title: Technical Due Diligence
item.description: A team of professional research engineers and architects with hand-on experiences on evaluation of buildings and engineering systems.

item.title: Traffic Impact Assessment
item.description: A group of experienced and senior traffic engineers to help you conducting in-depth traffic impact assessment for your projects.

item.title: Traffic Modelling
item.description: We apply latest models to perform simulations of micro and macro traffic simulations and OD matrix analysis for you to estimate traffic demands.

item.title: Traffic Safety
item.description: Conducting field studies and analyzing traffic behaviors and risk factors affecting the traffic accidents and safety, and recommending solutions.
